boardgame.name: Shifting Sands
boardgame.description: (from MMP website:)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Shifting Sands is a point-to-point movement, card driven game based on the World War II African campaigns of 1940-1943. From the first Italian attempts to cross _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;The Wire_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; through the Torch invasion, all aspects of the campaign for North Africa are covered including the Abyssinian Campaign of 1940-1941. Like the commanders of the day, you'll need to try and achieve your goals while events in other theaters influence your ability to maintain any semblance of a plan._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Contents:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;One mapsheet (approx 22_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;x32_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;) _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;One 36-page booket with rules, designer notes, and scenarios; only 16 pages of actual game rules _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Two countersheets - one 5/8_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; and one 5/8_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; and 1/2_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; mixed _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;2 decks of 55 cards - one allied and one axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;2 player aid cards _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;dice_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 2006 Charles S. Roberts Best World War II Boardgame Nominee
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: Point 2 Point Episode 11 - CSR, Shifting Sands, and Mike Rinella

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

I bought this game based on hype/buzz, but could never find time to play it. I have been the sole owner, stored in a smoke free environment. I have opened the box and put card sleeves on the two decks (included in the sale) and the countersheets are unpunched. I printed many of the extra play aids from the web and updated rulebook to get ready to play (also included in the sale), but could never push myself over the hump of finding time to play. I am hoping this will find time on the game table for someone else.
